body_html:
Also verbose unsqueeze is more readable in unsqueeze-squeeze calls, where you first unsqueeze a few dimensions, then call some function, then squeeze them back.

The order can be made deterministic by pre-sorting the list, but I agree it's not very intuitive.

Another option: x.unsqueeze(-1, repeat = 2)
body_text:
Also verbose unsqueeze is more readable in unsqueeze-squeeze calls, where you first unsqueeze a few dimensions, then call some function, then squeeze them back.
The order can be made deterministic by pre-sorting the list, but I agree it's not very intuitive.
Another option: x.unsqueeze(-1, repeat = 2)
body:
Also verbose `unsqueeze` is more readable in unsqueeze-squeeze calls, where you first unsqueeze a few dimensions, then call some function, then squeeze them back.

The order can be made deterministic by pre-sorting the list, but I agree it's not very intuitive.

Another option: `x.unsqueeze(-1, repeat = 2)`
